com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class EmailSender<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailSender<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - internal representation of an email. Depends on actual provider implementation.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheMailSender, AWSMailSender, JavaMailSender

    public abstract class EmailSender<E>
extends Object
    Base class in charge of sending emails. This class is a singleton and an instance must be obtained using getInstance and using current mail configuration.

      • getInstance

        public static EmailSender getInstance()
                               throws com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Factory method to obtain singleton instance using current mail configuration.
        Returns:
        singleton instance.
        Throws:
        com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if mail configuration fails.

      • getInstance

        protected static EmailSender getInstance(EmailProvider provider)
        Factory method to obtain appropriate subclass for a given email provider.
        Parameters:
        provider - provider to use.
        Returns:
        an email sender controller singleton.

      • isValidEmailAddress

        public static boolean isValidEmailAddress(String email)
        Determines if provided string corresponds to an email address. This method checks proper format of provided string to match the structure of an email address (i.e. user@host).
        Parameters:
        email - string containing an email address to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if provided string is a valid email address, false otherwise.

      • send

        public abstract String send(EmailMessage<E> m)
                     throws MailNotSentException
        Abstract method to send an email.
        Parameters:
        m - email message to be sent.
        Returns:
        id of message that has been sent.
        Throws:
        MailNotSentException - if mail couldn't be sent.

      • getProvider

        public abstract EmailProvider getProvider()
        Returns provider used by this email sender.
        Returns:
        email provider.
